alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Southern Mountains; Southwest Utah; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 8:49PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Millard...central Beaver and northeastern Iron Counties through 930 PM MDT... At 849 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Milford, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Milford and Black Rock. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 125 and 133. Interstate 70 between mile markers 0 and 1. Utah Route 21 between mile markers 65 and 88. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Mountains; Southern Mountains; Southwest Utah; Western Millard and Juab Counties
